text: bal ayqwlwn: 'iina hdha alquran aftarah muhamad min eind nfsh? fa'iinahum yaelamun 'anah bashar mthlhm!! qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: fatuu 'antum bisurat wahidat min jns hdha alquran fi nzmh whdayth, wastaeinuu ealaa dhlk bikuli man qadartm ealayh min dun allah min 'iins wjn, 'iin kuntum sadiqin fi dewakm
